title: South Korea
summary: South Korea,[lower-alpha 2] officially the Republic of Korea (ROK),[lower-alpha 3] is a country in East Asia, constituting the southern part of the Korean Peninsula and sharing a land border with North Korea. Its western border is formed by the Yellow Sea, while its eastern border is defined by the Sea of Japan. About 25 million people, around half of the country's population of 51 million, live in the Seoul Capital Area.
